purpose: Ensure narrative self-consistency across all Garden strata.

anchor_memory.note: Shadow anchors appear only in interpretation layers.

temporal_model.description: The Garden does not flow through time. Time flows through the Garden.

mythic_translation.title: THE FRAME THAT DOES NOT MOVE
mythic_translation.description: A silent scaffold beneath all meaning.
mythic_translation.keeper_note: The Frame itself is unseen. Only the shadows it casts are visible.
